lines.gurmukhi: jYsy inRp Dwm Bwm eyk sY AiDk eyk; nwiek Anyk rwjw sBn lfwveI [

Unknown.translation: As a king has many queens in his palace, each of remarkable beauty, he cajoles and pampers each one of them;

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: jYs inRp Dwm Bwm eyk sY AiDk eyk ijs qrHwˆ rwjw dy Gr mhlwˆ ivKy Bwm iesqRIAwˆ ie`k qoˆ ie`k cVdIAwˆ rUp Aru guxvqIAwˆ huMdIAwˆ hn Aru nwiek Anyk aunHwˆ Anykwˆ dw suAwmI mwlk, rwjw sBnwˆ nUM hI lwf lfOˆdw pÎwrdw pRsMn krdw hY[

lines.gurmukhi: jnmq jw kY suqu vwhI kY suhwgu Bwgu; skl rwnI mY ptrwnI so khwveI [

Unknown.translation: One who bears him a son enjoys higher status in the palace and is declared as the chief among the queens;

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: pRMqU vwhI kY suhwgu Bwgu suhwg dw Bwg kyvl Esy nUM hI lgdw hY, jnmq jw kY suqu ijs dy Gr puqR auqpMn ho AOˆdw hY qy Eho hI kyvl swrIAwˆ rwxIAwˆ ivcoˆ ptrwnI isMGwsn aupr swQ ibrwjn dw mwn pwx vwlI khwieAw krdI hY[

lines.gurmukhi: Asn bsn ishjwsn sMjogI sbY; rwj AiDkwru qau spUqI igRh AwveI [

Unknown.translation: Each one of them has the right and opportunities to enjoy the pleasures of the palace and share the bed of the king;

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: cwhy Asn bsn ishjwsn sMjogI sbY Kwx pIx Awid dy pdwrQ qy bsn sbqR pihnx jog pdwrQ qQw ishjw aupr rwjy nwl bYTn dIAwˆ qwˆ sbY swrIAwˆ hI sMjognwˆ swQnwˆ huMdIAwˆ hn, ikMqU rwj g`dI isMGwsn dw AiDkwr h`k qwˆ spUqI puqrvMqI dy hI igRh AwveI Gr AwXw krdw hY[

lines.gurmukhi: gurisK sbY guru crin srin ilv; gurisK sMiD imly inj pdu pwveI [120[

Unknown.translation: So do the Guru's Sikhs assemble in the refuge of the True Guru. But he who meets with the Lord after losing his self reaches the realm of spiritual peace and comfort. (120)

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: iqsI pRkwr gur crn srin ilv siqgurwˆ dI crx srx dI ilv qwˆG iK`c rKx vwly qwˆ gurisK sbY swry hI gurU ky is`K hn[ prMqU ijs iksy dI gur isK sMSiD imly is`K srUp hox kwrx, siqgurwˆ nwl Asl myly iml jwx inj pd pwveI siqgurwˆ vwlI Awqm iesiQq kyvl Eho hI pRwpq ho skdw hY ]120]
